reviews.positive_text:
Parties communes de l'hôtel très élégantes, bien décorées et agréables.
Bon emplacement géographique, à 10 minutes à pied du centre-ville.
Lit confortable.
reviews.negative_text:
Nous avons été très déçus de la petitesse de la chambre par rapport aux photos que nous avions vues sur la présentation générale de l'hôtel. Il est difficile de circuler autour du lit, a fortiori à 2, et les rangements sont vraiment minuscules.
La salle de bains, vieillotte et séparée par une simple porte coulissante (qui a tendance à se rouvrir toute seule, en plus, car il n'y a pas de verrou !) ne fait pas vraiment 3 étoiles...
L'isolation phonique est loin d'être parfaite entre les chambres (bruits de pas à l'étage au-dessus, chasse d'eau de la chambre mitoyenne).
Enfin, le petit-déjeuner est proposé à un tarif prohibitif (13,50€ par personne), de même que le parking privé (12€ la journée). Heureusement qu'il y a une boulangerie juste en face et des places gratuites dans le quartier !

reviews.review_title: Super emplacement pour un très bel hôtel de charme moderne et calme
reviews.positive_text:
Très belle maison, avec beaucoup de cachet. Toute l’équipe durant le séjour a été chaleureuse, accueillante et de bons conseils. Emplacement idéal pour découvrir la ville, proche d’un parc et à moins d’un quart heure à pied du centre. Parking dans l’hôtel. 
Deco moderne très agréable et recherchée. Équipements en chambre utiles (bouilloire, connectique) et de qualité (literie, bureau, chaise). Très bonne clim. 
Salle de bain spacieuse et très jolie. 
Petit déjeuner généreux, varié et frais. Tant que les jus, les laitages, céréales, fruits, pains, charcuterie, fruits secs…
Un excellent séjour dans cet établissement où nous reviendrons avec plaisir.

C'est impeccable, on s'y sent très bien, tout y est, de l'accueil au service à la déco au confort, même un ascenseur c'est dire, ne pas oublier de réserver le parking ça facilite la vie, nous reviendrons avec plaisir
Tout sauf le bruit dans la rue la nuit.

Très joli manoir, décoration soignée et moderne. L’accueil était chaleureux et professionnel , nous avons été surclassés gracieusement  (chambre plus grande). L’hôtel est très bien situé pas très loin du centre et un arrêt de bus juste devant l’hôtel permet d’accéder directement à l’aéroport.
Chambre très agréablement aménagée, literie très confortable. Le buffet du petit déjeuner est très complet et varié avec des produits de très bonne qualité.  C’était parfait

reviews.review_title: Hotel plein de potentiel - mais qui ne repond pas aux attentes
reviews.positive_text:
Chambre spacieuse.
Lit confortable.
Tres bonne odeur d'ambiance
Tres jolie decoration
reviews.negative_text:
le chauffage etait en panne. -2 degre dehors la nuit.
Une couverture supplementaire et un petit chauffage d'appoint (particulierement bruiilant et qui ne chauffe pas ce qui est a moins de 50 cm) n'ont pas suffit. J'ai pris froid. J'ai ete malade pendant une semaine. Aucun dedomagement ne m'a ete propose, aucune reduction dans le prix de la chambre (bien que j'ai paye pour une chambre chauffee!) aucune indemnisation ... J'ai ete tres tres decue.

A cela j;ajouterais qu'il n'y avait pas dans la chambre de chauffe serviette ni de suffisement de place pour ranger nos affaires dans une armoire qui n'en n'est pas une ni meme de coffer fort ni de mini frigidaire.

Le petit dejeuner etait cher relativement a ce qui est propose. Nous ne mangeaons pas de Glutten. Mais il n'y avait ni crudites ni fruits. et 1 seul choix de fromage ...

La dame del'acceuil etait tres aimable mais dans les faits, personne n'a rien vraiment fait pour aider a regler les problemes.

reviews.negative_text:
En arrivant nous avons été accueilli par un monsieur aimable, mais qui avait l'air un peu déprimé. Nous ne nous sommes pas formalisés... mais...
Le lendemain matin, après avoir rendu la clé, la personne de l'accueil nous a rappelé dans la rue alors que nous allions partir en voiture, car soi-disant nous n'avions pas payé notre chambre. Nous avons du lui montrer les justificatifs et même notre relevé bancaire! Elle ne nous croyait pas ! 
Oui l'erreur est humaine, mais quand elle a fini par se rendre compte qu'elle ne s'adressait pas aux personnes auxquelles elle pensait, elle a osé nous demander :" mais alors pourquoi vous m'avez rendu la clé de la chambre n° ... ?! " !!! Notre réponse : "et bien parce que c'est la chambre qu'on nous a donnée hier soir!!!"
Pour s'excuser elle nous a proposé un expresso (?!) , mais c'était trop tard, le mal était fait, nous avions perdu du temps car les gens de l'hôtel ne communiquent pas entre eux et sont très mal organisés. C'était limite humiliant !
J'étais vraiment très très agacée en repartant.

reviews.review_title: Probably the best 3 star hotel experience we have ever had!
reviews.positive_text: The staff were very helpful and so nice to deal with and the rooms were really clean. The location was superb as it was within close walking distance of the main commercial centre of the city, without all the hustle and bustle, and it felt quite safe at night. There is also a bus stop right outside the door which is very handy for travelling to and from the airport. We were made to feel so welcome that It felt like it was a home away from home. The shower/bathroom facilities were fantastic, and I always appreciate a large shower head with powerful water flow. The breakfast was not included in our original booking, but we decided to try it on our first morning. It was a well laid out continental breakfast that was so tasty, we ended up booking it in for the rest of our trip. As a 3 star hotel it's also great value for money, and we will definitely be staying here the next time we return to La Rochelle

reviews.review_title: Art and comfort near the centre of La Rochelle
reviews.positive_text: Lovely building full of interesting art. Excellent communication and our engagement with all the members of the team was very helpful and positive. We appreciated being able to park on site (for a reasonable fee), and were also granted a late check out on request, which was helpful. Our room was small-ish, but comfortable with everything we needed. Ideal location for what we wanted to do in La Rochelle, and an easy walk to the centre. Breakfast was also a treat, with lots of home-baked goodies.
reviews.negative_text: Our room was on the street, so we had a bit of noise from there, but it was quiet at night. We also would have preferred thicker curtains to keep out the light in the evening. But these are very minor things and didn't take away from a great stay.

reviews.review_title: Beautiful decor; professional staff; excellent value!
reviews.positive_text: Perfectly located in order to visit La Rochelle. Beautiful decor; professional staff; excellent value. We wish we could have stayed longer.

reviews.review_title: Small boutique hotel in La Rochelle
reviews.positive_text: The best croissants & pastries of our month long French break! Spacious room with tea/coffee making facilities & nice touches like tissues. Friendly, helpful staff. On site parking (paid). Walking distance to town & restaurants
reviews.negative_text: Liked most things though yoghurts with fruit rather than just fruit flavoured would have been good

reviews.review_title: Absolutely lovely. We had our dogs with us, no problem and park yards away.
reviews.positive_text: Friendly welcome. Lovely staff, clean, smart and totally lovely.

The hotel was perfect for our stay plenty of room for the three of us who were travelling. It was very close to the city centre approximately a 10 minute walk and not far from a regional park or the bus station. There was a bus stop right outside the hotel which brings you to and from the airport in La Rochelle.
Lovely hotel, helpful staff, very good breakfast.
reviews.negative_text: Room and bed was smaller than we were expecting.

reviews.positive_text: Breakfast and locayltion good

reviews.positive_text: Great quiet location.  Clean accommodation and very comfortable bed.  Funky artwork. Easy walking distance to port and restaurants. Very friendly, helpful staff. Reserved parking on-site.

reviews.review_title: Although bedrooms were small we felt like we were staying in a 4 star luxury property.

reviews.review_title: Super cool hotel, great staff and ideal location

Air conditioning in room was fantastic as was the super walk in shower with an enormous rainfall shower head.

reviews.positive_text:
Excellent location, quiet, clean spacious room (prestige double) querky decor and interesting artwork.  Le Manoir has an atmosphere of elegant charm. 

Ensuite facilities are modern with nice shower - toilet decor could do with refresh.  Attentive staff + super cold buffet breakfast with a large selection of fruits, yoghurts, compotes, pastries, breads, cakes and delicious home made peanut butter.

Definitely will recommend and return.
reviews.negative_text:
Nothing to dislike. 
 
Toilet decor in need of refresh.  Dressing gowns and a few extra toiletries (shampoo, body lotion) could enhance room and would be welcomed.

reviews.review_title: Would love to visit again, our stay was too short.
reviews.positive_text: Room was small but perfect. Lots of lovely art work throughout the hotel. Breakfast was one of the nicest buffet breakfasts of our trip. It was only an 8 minute walk to the harbour through a small park and lovely streets.

reviews.review_title: Very comfortable, clean and good value hotel in a lovely quiet location.

reviews.positive_text: This was a beautiful hotel. We were impressed as soon as we arrived. The welcome from the team was perfect. We loved the decor, especially the artwork, furniture and the little cats. It was in a great location to visit La Rochelle but also very quiet and peaceful. The on site reserved parking was also great Thank you to all the team for a wonderful stay
reviews.negative_text: Nothing. It was all perfect.

reviews.positive_text: Roomy, clean, comfortable
A beautiful hotel with a nice walk of 10 to 15 minutes through a park to the beach and the old town. Excellent breakfast. Recommended.

reviews.review_title: Beautiful comfortable property with excellent rooms (and beds) a short walk from La Rochelle.
reviews.positive_text: Our second stay here and it will not be our last. This lovely old property has been beautifully restored and decorated, the rooms are large and comfortable with huge beds which are extremely comfortable. The short walk into La Rochelle through the park is very easy to enjoy the huge array of restaurants, bars and street vendors. The staff are very welcominh and helpful and the breakfast also was excellent. Thanks again Le Manoir !!

There is a very small car park available for residents but a space has to be pre booked. I particularly enjoyed the variety and choice for breakfast. A very enjoyable stay.

reviews.review_title: Smart, good value for money hotel in La Rochelle

reviews.review_title: A stylish and welcoming hotel in a fine well-decorated manoir within easy reach of city centre
reviews.positive_text: A really good hotel !  Easy to find and just a 15/20 minute walk to the centre of the city, though close to a bus route also. Parking in front of the hotel was extremely useful (reserve before you arrive). The welcome was warm, and the room was well equipped. Large bathroom. The hotel décor is very smart and super clean. Breakfast was excellent with a wide choice and many home-baked cakes and breakfast treats. We would certainly stay again, and since we often visit this city we probably will !
reviews.negative_text: Everything was great.

reviews.positive_text:
Staff extremely welcoming. Good location from town. Value for money.
Only one complaint, being the cutlery having dreadful knives that are irritating and awesome to handle.
Overall a very enjoyable stay.

reviews.review_title: Buena opción para visitar La Rochelle
reviews.positive_text: Es un gran hotel. Pedi reservar una plaza de parking (tienen solo cinco enfrente del hotel) y sin problemas. Cuando llegamos ya teníamos todo listo (plaza de parking incluida). Tuvimos un problema con la limpieza de la habitación pero lo arreglaron inmediatamente y encima tuvieron un detalle con nosotros... que más pedir. Es un gran hotel que, si cuidan un poco más esos detalles, estoy seguro de que podría llegar a considerarse de mayor nivel.

reviews.negative_text:
Purtroppo per noi, nessuno in famiglia è alto meno di 1.50 metri. Pertanto, la “suite famigliare sottotetto” (pagata a caro prezzo visto il nome altisonante) si è rivelata per noi tremendamente inadeguata. La scala angusta per salire in camera era larga a sufficienza per un bambino di massimo 3 anni, non certo per 4 adulti con le relative valigie. Stessa cosa per “l’armadio”: una tenda ad altezza caviglie che non poteva contenere, in altezza, nemmeno un paio di pantaloni. Perfino la doccia era di difficile utilizzo.
Nell’altra camera, dietro una tenda orripilante, era nascosta una brandina di risulta che ha reso particolarmente evidente l’iniziale funzione di questa stanza: un solaio adibito a magazzino. 
Terribile anche il patio, che sembra più il retrobottega di un ferramenta. 
Abbiamo fatto un viaggio in macchina attraverso tutta la Francia, e questo è stato l’alloggio più caro per distacco, e anche il peggiore senza ombra di dubbio. 
State lontani se non avete voglia di strisciare sulla moquette (con macchie da bruciatura) per raggiungere il lavandino la mattina.

Wir haben uns sehr wohl gefühlt.
